info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 01 at 4:16AM PDT until September 01 at 5:15AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central San Bernardino County in southern California... South central Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 515 AM PDT. * At 415 AM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Nipton Road Mile Marker 3, or 17 miles southwest of Searchlight, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs and trees. * Locations impacted include... Primm, Nipton, Mountain Pass, Nipton Road Mile Marker 3 and Nipton And Ivanpah Roads. This includes the following roads... Interstate 15 in California between mile markers 168 and 186. Interstate 15 in Nevada between mile markers 1 and 2. State Route 164 in Clark County between mile markers 1 and 11. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
